WRITING.TITLE: PSP worth getting if you have a vita.
WRITING.TEXT: I was wondering if a PSP is worth getting if you already own a vita. One of the reasons is that a PSP's memory cards are much cheaper and it can also play UMD only games like Birth by Sleep.
